diningExperience.title: Guide to Enjoying Pho at Ph·ªü Ho√†i
diningExperience.description: At Ph·ªü Ho√†i Vietnam branch, customers can experience the full flavor with signature condiments such as homemade chili sauce, hand-pickled garlic, spicy satay, black sauce, sliced chili, fresh lemon, and various herbs. Meanwhile, at Ph·ªü Ho√†i Osaka branch, due to ingredient limitations, we serve accompanying condiments such as homemade Northern chili sauce, pickled garlic made from Japanese apples, black sauce, and fresh lemon. Although simpler, the condiment set here still ensures a harmonious and unique Ph·ªü Ho√†i flavor.
diningExperience.stepsTitle: How to eat pho Ph·ªü Ho√†i style:
steps: Taste the broth before adding condiments. A delicious authentic pho bowl must have a rich broth that is attractive even without added condiments.
Depending on your taste, add condiments such as lemon, chili sauce, black sauce, pickled garlic, bean sprouts, etc., to the pho bowl. Mix well and stir gently to blend the flavors.
Enjoy pho with side dishes like fried dough sticks to experience the diversity and richness of flavors.
Savor each bite of pho, each piece of meat, along with a few spoonfuls of broth. Feel the balance between the ingredients until the broth is almost gone.
An authentic pho bowl is when, after eating, the broth remains warm enough for the customer to sip the last drop and feel the complete flavor.
diningExperience.last: This is the art of enjoying pho in Ph·ªü Ho√†i style ‚Äì where each pho bowl is a culinary experience full of sophistication and love!

items.title: Stir-fried Pho
items.description: Stir-fried pho uses Japanese A4 beef, stir-fried with fresh ginger in a hot pan, releasing an enticing aroma. Combined with fresh green onions and rich broth, this dish captivates not only with its unique aroma but also with its mesmerizing colors. Each tender piece of meat is full of flavor, perfectly blending with the overall taste, providing an unforgettable culinary experience.

items.title: Rare Beef Pho
items.description: Japanese A4 beef is tender, combined with the rich broth unique to the Ph·ªü Ho√†i brand, creating a perfect rare beef pho bowl. The rich, delicate flavor blends into each noodle and slice of beef, providing an unforgettable culinary experience. One taste leaves a deep impression on customers, making them always crave this wonderful flavor.

items.title: Brisket Pho
items.description: Under the talented hands of Ph·ªü Ho√†i chefs, brisket is turned into tender meat pieces, absorbing the unique spices and rich broth. Especially, this dish has no unpleasant beef smell, but instead, each piece of meat exudes a delicate aroma. This is a favorite choice for customers of all ages, from the elderly to children, thanks to its harmonious flavor.

items.title: Wagyu A5 Beef Pho
items.description: Wagyu A5 Beef Pho features the highest-grade Japanese Wagyu beef, carefully selected by Pho Hoai to satisfy discerning food lovers. The beef is incredibly tender, melting in your mouth with rich marbling that enhances its flavor without being overwhelming. Raised using special techniques, Japanese Wagyu offers a level of quality that even major markets like the US and Australia cannot match. This combination of traditional pho and premium Wagyu beef elevates the dish to a new level, solidifying its place as a must-try for those who appreciate fine cuisine.

items.title: Tendon Pho
items.description: Tendon is one of the signature dishes of Ph·ªü Ho√†i Osaka branch and the entire Ph·ªü Ho√†i system. With a special stewing method, the tendon remains soft, transparent, and non-greasy. Especially, Ph·ªü Ho√†i's tendon is carefully selected from the procurement stage, ensuring the highest quality, but also limited in quantity. This is not only an ideal topping but also a natural source of collagen, making pho lovers hard to resist its allure.

items.title: Chicken Pho
items.description: Ph·ªü Ho√†i's chicken pho uses broth made from beef bones, providing a rich and unique flavor. Only chicken thigh meat is used, ensuring tenderness, unlike dry chicken breast. More specially, the chicken is cooked directly in the broth, allowing the pho flavor to evenly penetrate each piece of meat. Therefore, each piece of chicken exudes a unique aroma, making customers unforgettable with this delicate flavor.

items.title: Combination Pho
items.description: Ph·ªü Ho√†i's combination pho perfectly combines all toppings, providing a rich and complete culinary experience. From tender beef, chewy tendon, fatty brisket to rich chicken, each ingredient contributes to a symphony for the taste buds. Customers will be led through each level of flavor, from gentle sophistication to rich unforgettable taste. This is a dish that any first-time visitor to the restaurant cannot miss.

items.title: Side Dish: Traditional Spring Rolls
items.description: Traditional spring rolls are the dish that international customers always prioritize when visiting Vietnamese restaurants. The special attraction lies in the harmonious combination of meat filling with fresh ingredients, providing a rich unforgettable flavor. The golden crispy crust creates a 'crunch' sound with each bite, but unlike fast food fried dishes, it is not greasy. This is a dish that retains tradition while conquering the taste buds of customers worldwide.
